newsitem.title: PERU: Credicorp Ltd Q1 shr $0.40 vs $0.37.
newsitem.headline: Credicorp Ltd Q1 shr $0.40 vs $0.37.

text.p: (All Data Above in US$ Millions Except Per Share Numbers)

NOTE: The company posted net interest income for the first quarter of 1997 at US $94.5 million from US $72.3 million in the first quarter of 1996. Net interest income growth was attributed to increased volume of interest earning assets and to higher interest margins.
Provisions for possible loan losses were US $18.3 million, compared with US $9.4 for the same period last year.
Earnings per share are based on 73.6 million net outstanding shares for both 1997 and 1996 first quarters.
